name: Supa Pong
description:
This game is my first game, so I hope ya'll like it. It was also made in one day (starting small, lol). Thanks for checking it out :)

Controls:

W and S control the left paddle

Up and Down arrows control the right paddle

I'm also working on a longer term project, but every now and then I'll release a made-in-one-day project like this.
